title: Unconditional import of geteuid on Windows

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
```
[00:09:50] ======================================================================
[00:09:50] ERROR: Failure: ImportError (cannot import name 'geteuid')
[00:09:50] ----------------------------------------------------------------------
[00:09:50] Traceback (most recent call last):
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\failure.py", line 39, in runTest
[00:09:50]     raise self.exc_val.with_traceback(self.tb)
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\loader.py", line 418, in loadTestsFromName
[00:09:50]     addr.filename, addr.module)
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\importer.py", line 47, in importFromPath
[00:09:50]     return self.importFromDir(dir_path, fqname)
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\importer.py", line 94, in importFromDir
[00:09:50]     mod = load_module(part_fqname, fh, filename, desc)
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\imp.py", line 234, in load_module
[00:09:50]     return load_source(name, filename, file)
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\imp.py", line 172, in load_source
[00:09:50]     module = _load(spec)
[00:09:50]   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 693, in _load
[00:09:50]   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 673, in _load_unlocked
[00:09:50]   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap_external>", line 662, in exec_module
[00:09:50]   File "<frozen importlib._bootstrap>", line 222, in _call_with_frames_removed
[00:09:50]   File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\distribution\tests\test_clone.py", line 28, in <module>
[00:09:50]     from os import geteuid
[00:09:50] ImportError: cannot import name 'geteuid'

```
